title: Font help please - this font has stumped me!
content:
Hi Everyone,

I need some serious help identifying this font in the photos attached. I'm not 100% sure it is an actual font - or it was at one point and then played with (obvious but the thunder bolt)

My thought process lead me to to think it was something like: 'Thirsty Script' but it's not block enough. Then i thought it might be a variation on a baseball style. That didn't lead anywhere either. I ended up very close with 'TX NineBolt' but it's still not 100%

Anyone else able to help on this one?

Cheers

| [20130419-band-of-horses-15-x595-1366405233.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828203357/http:/typophile.com/files/20130419-band-of-horses-15-x595-1366405233.jpg) | 32.4 KB |
| [464079935\_1fd694f2c5\_z.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828203357/http:/typophile.com/files/464079935_1fd694f2c5_z.jpg) | 52.11 KB |
author: Hola Pistola

comments.content: Other option, possibly matching, [Millie](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828203357/http:/fonts.kylewaynebenson.com/millie) by Kyle W. Benson.
